scripts.cdk-diff-dev: npm run build && cdk diff "*" -c config=dev --profile aws_profile
scripts.cdk-diff-qa: npm run build && cdk diff "*" -c config=qa --profile aws_profile
scripts.cdk-diff-prod: npm run build && cdk diff "*" -c config=prod --profile aws_profile
scripts.cdk-deploy-dev: npm run build && cdk deploy "*" -c config=dev --profile aws_profile --require-approval=never  --progress=events
scripts.cdk-deploy-qa: npm run build && cdk deploy "*" -c config=qa --profile aws_profile --require-approval=never  --progress=events
scripts.cdk-deploy-prod: npm run build && cdk deploy "*" -c config=prod --profile aws_profile --require-approval=never  --progress=events
